create or replace PACKAGE pdm_avy_tapi_pck
IS
-- Table API package for table pdm_attribute_volatilities
-- Generated by VI TAPI generator version 6.2  (TAPI generated 03-Jan-2022  05:40:58)

-- Generated global constants

g_lock_conflicts  PLS_INTEGER := 0;

                       , o_rt_avy   OUT pdm_attribute_volatilities%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

                          , i_avy_IMD_ID   IN  pdm_attribute_volatilities.IMD_ID%TYPE
                          , i_avy_MSE_ID   IN  pdm_attribute_volatilities.MSE_ID%TYPE

RETURN BOOLEAN
;

                              , i_avy_IMD_ID   IN  pdm_attribute_volatilities.IMD_ID%TYPE
                              , i_avy_MSE_ID   IN  pdm_attribute_volatilities.MSE_ID%TYPE

RETURN BOOLEAN

;


END pdm_avy_tapi_pck;

package body pdm_avy_tapi_pck
is




function avy_select_row( i_avy_id   in  pdm_attribute_volatilities.id%type
                       , o_rt_avy   out pdm_attribute_volatilities%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.avy_select_row';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_avy ( i_avy_id   in  pdm_attribute_volatilities.id%type )
      is 
           select *
             from pdm_attribute_volatilities avy
            where avy.id = i_avy_id ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_avy( i_avy_id => i_avy_id );
         fetch c_avy into o_rt_avy;
         l_found := c_avy%found;
         close c_avy;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc 
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_avy%isopen
         then
            close c_avy;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end avy_select_row;

function avy_select_row_uk( i_avy_adn_id   in  pdm_attribute_volatilities.adn_id%type
                          , i_avy_imd_id   in  pdm_attribute_volatilities.imd_id%type
                          , i_avy_mse_id   in  pdm_attribute_volatilities.mse_id%type
                          , o_rt_avy  out pdm_attribute_volatilities%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.avy_select_row_uk';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_avy ( i_avy_adn_id   in  pdm_attribute_volatilities.adn_id%type
                   , i_avy_imd_id   in  pdm_attribute_volatilities.imd_id%type
                   , i_avy_mse_id   in  pdm_attribute_volatilities.mse_id%type )
      is
         select *
           from pdm_attribute_volatilities avy
          where avy.adn_id = i_avy_adn_id 
            and avy.imd_id = i_avy_imd_id 
            and ( avy.mse_id = i_avy_mse_id or (avy.mse_id is null  and i_avy_mse_id is null  ));
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_avy(i_avy_adn_id => i_avy_adn_id, i_avy_imd_id => i_avy_imd_id, i_avy_mse_id => i_avy_mse_id);
         fetch c_avy into o_rt_avy;
         l_found := c_avy%found;
         close c_avy;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
   when others
    then
      if c_avy%isopen
      then
         close c_avy;
      end if;
      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end avy_select_row_uk;

function avy_select_row_upd( i_avy_id   in  pdm_attribute_volatilities.id%type
                           , o_rt_avy   out pdm_attribute_volatilities%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.avy_select_row_upd';
   l_found                boolean      := false;

   cursor c_avy ( i_avy_id   in  pdm_attribute_volatilities.id%type )
   is
           select *
             from pdm_attribute_volatilities avy
            where avy.id = i_avy_id 
         for update;
begin
   viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

   
   open c_avy( i_avy_id => i_avy_id );
   fetch c_avy into o_rt_avy;
   l_found := c_avy%found;
   close c_avy;

   viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                          , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

   return l_found;

exception
   when others
   then
      if c_avy%isopen
      then
         close c_avy;
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );

end avy_select_row_upd;

function avy_select_row_upd_uk( i_avy_adn_id   in  pdm_attribute_volatilities.adn_id%type
                              , i_avy_imd_id   in  pdm_attribute_volatilities.imd_id%type
                              , i_avy_mse_id   in  pdm_attribute_volatilities.mse_id%type
                              , o_rt_avy  out pdm_attribute_volatilities%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.avy_select_row_upd_uk';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   begin
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      
      l_found := avy_select_row_uk( i_avy_adn_id   =>  i_avy_adn_id
                                  , i_avy_imd_id   =>  i_avy_imd_id
                                  , i_avy_mse_id   =>  i_avy_mse_id
                                  , o_rt_avy => o_rt_avy );
      if l_found
      then
         
         l_found := avy_select_row_upd( i_avy_id => o_rt_avy.id
                                      , o_rt_avy => o_rt_avy );
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

        viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc);
   end;
end avy_select_row_upd_uk;

procedure avy_lock_row( i_avy_id   in  pdm_attribute_volatilities.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.avy_lock_row';
begin
  declare
     cursor c_avy ( i_avy_id   in  pdm_attribute_volatilities.id%type )
     is
             select ''
               from pdm_attribute_volatilities avy
              where avy.id = i_avy_id 
         for update;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         
         if i_avy_id is not null
         then
            begin
                
                avy_lock_row_nowait( i_avy_id => i_avy_id );
            exception
               when viu_constant.exc_lockfailed
               then
                  
                  g_lock_conflicts := g_lock_conflicts + 1;

                  
                  viu_info.reset_package_variables;

                  
                  open c_avy( i_avy_id => i_avy_id );
                  close c_avy;
               end;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_avy%isopen
         then
            close c_avy;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end avy_lock_row;

procedure avy_lock_row_nowait( i_avy_id   in  pdm_attribute_volatilities.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.avy_lock_row_nowait';
begin
   declare
      cursor c_avy ( i_avy_id   in  pdm_attribute_volatilities.id%type )
      is
              select ''
                from pdm_attribute_volatilities avy
               where avy.id = i_avy_id 
          for update nowait;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin

         
         if i_avy_id is not null
         then
            
            open c_avy( i_avy_id => i_avy_id );

            close c_avy;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
        if c_avy%isopen
        then
           close c_avy;
        end if;

        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

        viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_lockfailed
                           , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                           , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                           , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                           , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_avy_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end avy_lock_row_nowait;


end pdm_avy_tapi_pck;
/
